data.title: Life’s Work: An Interview with Barbra Streisand
data.meta_description: Photography: Russell James Barbra Streisand was a Broadway star at age 20, and by 35 had won two Oscars, six of her 10 Grammys to date, a Tony, and the first of multiple Emmys. A polarizing icon (“I’m opinionated—people either appreciate that or they hate it”), she went on to write, produce, and direct films, […]
data.text:
Alison Beard is an executive editor at Harvard Business Review and previously worked as a reporter and editor at the Financial Times. A mom of two, she tries—and sometimes succeeds—to apply management best practices to her household.
